author: lecriste
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes most of the duplicated hardcoded labels in the HGCal validation scripts, and parallelizes the plot creation across different DQM folders. 
No changes are expected in the output, except for a `simClusters` -> `SimClusters` renaming of a DQM folder.

#### PR validation:

`makeHGCalValidationPlots.py --collection tracksters`
title: [HGCAL] Improve validation scripts
